subject: Programming
title: AI-Assisted Development
description: A 1-minute de-risking session on AI-Assisted Development.

hook.text: AI tools now suggest code as you type. Copilots autocomplete entire functions in seconds.

buildup.text: Trained on billions of lines of code, AI assistants generate boilerplate and spot common patterns.

discovery.text: Developers who use AI tools report writing code 30-50% faster on routine tasks.

twist.text: AI can also suggest buggy or insecure code. Humans must still review, understand, and verify.

climax.text: AI won't replace developers. It will replace developers who refuse to use AI.

punchline.text: AI writes the code. Humans own the decisions.

quiz.question: What risk do AI coding assistants introduce?
options: They can suggest buggy or insecure code
They only work in one language
